phrases: Zankoku na tenshi no youni Like an angel without a sense of mercy...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare...rise young boy to the heavens as a legend.
Aoi kaze ga i am about to Cold winds, as blue as the sea...
Tear open the door to your heart...
But unknowing you seem, just staring at me...
Sotto fureru mono Desperate for something to touch...
Motomeru koto ni muchu de A moment of kindness like that in a dream..
Your innocent eyes as yet have no idea...
Itaikena hitomi...of the path your destiny will follow.
But someday you will become aware of...
Sono senaka niwa...everything that you have got behind you.
Your wings are for seeking out...
Hanega arukoto...a new future that only you can search for.
Madobe kara yagate tobitatsu...through a portal like your pulsing blood.
Hotobashiru atsui pathos de If you should betray the chapel of your memories...
Omoide wo uragiru nara...the cruel angel will enter the window of your soul.
So boy, stand tall and embrace the fire of legend...
Embrace the universe like a blazing star!
As of 0130 PM today, a special state of emergency has been declared
for the Kanto and Chubu regions surrounding the Tokai district.
All residents must evacuate to their designated shelters immediately.
the Kanto and Chubu regions surrounding the Tokai district
have been declared to be under a state of emergency.
All residents must evacuate to their designated shelters immediately.
Why did I have to lose him now?
Christ, why at a time like this?
I should not have come here after all.
Well, I guess we will not be meeting here.
I will have to go to a shelter.
The unidentified object is coming toward us.
We have got it on visual.
I am putting it on the main screen.
It is been fifteen years, has not it?
It is still heading towards Tokyo 3.
The Air Defense Force does not have the firepower to stop it!
Hit it with everything we have got!
Mobilize all the units from Atsugi and scramble the squadrons from lruma!
Destroy the target at any cost!
Guided missiles and artillery have no effect either.
We gave it everything we have got and we are not even touching it!
Is it protected by an AT field?
Conventional weapons are no match for the Angels.
We will execute the plan at once.
They are going to use an N2-mine?!
Sorry, but it looks like you will not be getting a shot at it.
Yeah, but my mouth is full of dirt.
Yeah, but my mouth is full of dirt.
I am glad we have met at last, Shinji Ikari.
We are unable to confirm due to all the EMP interference.
You saw the size of that explosion.
We have got an energy reading at the explosion's epicenter!
No effect, I cannot believe it!
His safety is my top priority, so could you get a car train ready for us?
Well, I volunteered to pick him up,
so it is my duty to make sure he gets there.
I just had this car restored, and now it is a wreck.
33 loan repayments to go... and the repair costs...
Um, Misato... 33 loan repayments to go... and the repair costs...
Even worse, my only good clothes have been ruined...
Are you sure you can just take those?
It is an emergency, and we need a working car right now, right?
And I am a government official, after all,
so everything's going to be perfectly fine, okay?
I do not think anyone will buy that.
You are not as cute as I thought you were.
You are just a kid, after all.
You are not as mature as I thought you were.
As we predicted, it is regenerating itself.
If it could not, it would not be a practical autonomous invasion weapon.
It appears it can even upgrade its own operational functions.
And it is also getting smarter.
It will renew its assault any minute now.
Yes, it is a secret organization under the control of the United Nations.
Yes, it is a secret organization under the control of the United Nations.
Yes, it is a secret organization under the control of the United Nations.
This is a B-22 Special Express departing for G33-1.
It is the one my father belongs to, is not it?
This is a B-22 Special Express departing for G33-1.
Well, yeah... do you know what he does?
This is a B-22 Special Express departing for G33-1.
This train will bypass all other stations.
My teachers told me it was important to the safety of the human race.
From this point on, command of the operation will be entrusted to you.
Show us that you are capable.
Mr. Ikari, we must admit that our weapons have no effect on the target.
Mr. Ikari, we must admit that our weapons have no effect on the target.
But are you sure you can beat these things?
It is what NERV was created for.
We are all praying that you are correct.
Our current ability to intercept is only 7.5.
Even the UN forces are exhausted.
What are you going to do?
Another spare will be delivered soon.
Are you taking me to my father?
Did not you get an ID card from your dad?
Am I going to work for him?
He would not have sent me a letter unless he needed me for something.
It looks like you do not get along with your dad.
It is the same with me.
This is our secret base: NERV Headquarters.
This is the key to rebuilding our world.
Is not this the right way?
Central Dogma's closed passages remain sealed.
This is why I hate wearing skirts here.
Central Dogma's closed passages remain sealed.
And where in the heck is Ritsuko?
And where in the heck is Ritsuko?
I am just not used to this place yet.
We passed this spot just a little while ago.
And anyway, they make these systems to be used, you know.
Would the chairperson of E Project, Technical Department Division 1,
Dr. Ritsuko Akagi, Dr. Ritsuko Akagi,
contact Captain Misato Katsuragi of Operations, Division 1, immediately.
Why are you wasting my time, Captain Katsuragi?
Are not you aware that we are short on both time and manpower?
According to the Marduk report, he is the Third Child.
I am glad to meet you.
I am glad to meet you.
He is just like his dad.
Their first meeting in over three years.
Vice Commander, the target has started moving again.
It is currently undergoing refrigeration, using the B-type equipment.
It is never worked before, has it?
We call it, pathetically enough, the O-9 System.
Does that mean it does not work?
Well, it is just a number.
Anyway, it is a bit too late to be saying, Sorry, it did not work.
You will not find this in the manual.
This is Man's ultimate humanoid fighting machine,
the first model of the synthetic life form Evangelion, Unit 01.
Built here in secret, it is Mankind's last hope.
Is this part of what my father's been doing?
Unit 00's still in cryo-stasis, is not it?
Unit 00's still in cryo-stasis, is not it?
You are going to use Unit 01?
Now wait, Rei cannot do it yet, can she?
But even Rei Ayanami took seven months to synchronize with her Eva.
It is impossible for him to do it!
He just has to sit in the seat.
We do not expect more than that.
Repelling that Angel is our ultimate priority.
Repelling that Angel is our ultimate priority.
If putting someone who has a chance of synchronizing into an Eva unit
gives us even the slightest chance, then we have to do it.
You do understand that, do not you, Captain Katsuragi?
Father, why did you send for me?
So, you are asking me to take this thing and go out there and fight?
How can you do something like this to me?
How can you do something like this to me?
I knew you did not want me!
I called you because I have a need for you.
I have never even seen anything like this before!
If you are going to pilot it, do it now and quickly.
It must have detected our location.
Shinji, we do not have any time.
I did not come for this!
Shinji, just why did you come here?
You must confront your father and you must confront yourself.
Reconfigure Unit 01's system to Rei, then re-activate!
Call off the present work, and begin re-activation.
I am not needed after all.
It broke off the right arm-restraint!
It broke off the right arm-restraint!
It did not have an entry plug inserted!
Cage now in position for docking.
Signal plug terminator has been ejected.
Once your lungs are filled with LCL,
your blood will be oxygenated directly.
You will get used to it.
You are a boy, are not you?!
Configure the language logic interface for Japanese.
Release safety locks numbers one through fifteen.
Move Eva Unit 01 to the ejector pad.
Unless we defeat the Angels, we have no future.
Ikari, are you sure about this?
Shinji, do not get killed out there.
Eva defeats the Angel, but that is only the beginning.
Shinji runs away from his father and insists on staying alone...
Oh yeah, and I will have fanservice for you as well!
